title: Hextech crafting ward skin name bug
body:
The name of this ward skin has been displaying the internal name of the item recently. If it is any help, it was part of the original promo loot when HC launched, but only started displaying this way after the last patch.
https://i.gyazo.com/73d620dd7c6077bb806d4f1f02096f53.png

replies.body:
**loot_name_ward_skin_rental_24, theres a lot more of those, so I'm pretty sure that's the actual name of the ward....
cant you tell just from looking at the name?**loot_name_ward_skin_rental_24 sounds normal to me
